mapper.insert:
select corp_seq.nextval from dual
insert into CORP(CORP_NO, USER_NO, CORP_NAME, CORP_INTRO, CORP_IMGURL, CORP_AVRPAY, CORP_KIND, CORP_PNUMBER, CORP_HEADNAME, CORP_ZIPCODE, CORP_ADDRESS1, COL_ADDRESS2, CORP_CORPADDNUMBER, CORP_INDUSTRY, CORP_STARTDATE, CORP_WEBADDRESS, CORP_TEL, CORP_OKCHECK) values(#{corpNo}, #{userNo}, #{corpName}, #{corpIntro},#{corpImgurl},#{corpAvrpay}, #{corpKind},#{corpPnumber},#{corpHeadname},#{corpZipcode},#{corpAddress1},#{corpAddress2},#{corpCorpaddnumber},#{corpIndustry},#{corpStardate},#{corpWebaddress},#{corpTel},0)
